answers.answer: I have gestational diabetes.  This is my second pregnancy. I am having to take meds and test my sugars 4 times a day. The meal plan they put me on really isnt that hard to follow. If you just stick to what they say you shouldnt need the meds. I just have issues with my sugar in the mornings when I wake up and that's why I have to take meds. hopefully all will be good with you. Just listen to your doctor and dieticians.
I scored high on my screening and I have to go now to do my 3hr test :( not looking fwd to it but I'm hoping for the best (that I don't have GD). Good luck to you!!!

I was diagnosed with gestational diabetes even though I barely have a sugar problem. So keep your head up and wait for the results, even if you test positive you may find out that all you have to do is avoid an extra piece of bread or those extra sweets here or there.

question: The lab called me today, and asked me to call them back. I am pretty sure I failed my glucose test. What happens next? I am a second time mom, and this wasn't an issue with my daughter. Has anybody ever had gestational diabetes?
title: gestational diabetes
